title: Fix CC3 skills for Pi-agent compatibility
description:
Pi-agent has stricter skill validation than Claude Code. The CC3 skills have frontmatter issues that cause warnings on Pi-agent startup.

## Issues to Fix

### Critical (breaks loading)
1. **Name collisions** (4 skills) - archive/ folder has duplicates:
   - async-repl-protocol
   - router-first-architecture  
   - search-hierarchy
   - search-tools
   
2. **Names with underscores** (8 skills) - must be lowercase a-z, 0-9, hyphens only:
   - continuity_ledger → continuity-ledger
   - create_handoff → create-handoff
   - describe_pr → describe-pr
   - implement_plan → implement-plan
   - implement_plan_micro → implement-plan-micro
   - implement_task → implement-task
   - resume_handoff → resume-handoff
   - system_overview → system-overview

3. **Missing descriptions** (8 skills):
   - loogle-search, recall, remember, system_overview
   - tldr-deep, tldr-overview, tldr-router, tour

4. **Name mismatches** (4 skills) - frontmatter name ≠ directory name:
   - math-unified has name: math
   - agent-browser has name: Agent Browser
   - self-improving-agent has name: self-improvement
   - superdesign has name: frontend-design

### Warnings (noisy but non-blocking)
- ~60 skills have unknown frontmatter fields: user-invocable, triggers, priority, keywords, model, version, type, homepage, read_when

## Proposed Fix Order
1. Remove archive/ folder (fixes collisions immediately)
2. Rename underscore directories to hyphens
3. Add missing descriptions
4. Fix name mismatches in frontmatter
5. (Optional) Remove unknown frontmatter fields or update Pi-agent to ignore them

title: Fix finalize/handoff/checkpoint context + GH close flow
description:
Spec:
- Add session-summary extraction to prevent finalize amnesia (infer bead + outcome from transcript).
- Infer primary bead automatically; only ask if ambiguous.
- Propose outcome with reasoning; allow user override.
- Finalize must close linked GH issue (use bead external-ref or set then close).
- Make artifact editing trustworthy: validate mode + primary_bead + filename, only edit returned artifact.
- Avoid prompt-time $VAR expansion (use Python wrapper, no $ARTIFACT_PATH).
- Commit/push only if explicitly requested.

description:
